chloride.performance.fastchest.title: Fast Chests
chloride.performance.fastchest.desc:
Replaces chests model with a solid block models with no animations.

This option has no effect when EBE and Flywheel is installed in favor of their own optimizations.
chloride.performance.fastbeds.title: Fast Beds
chloride.performance.fastbeds.desc: Replaces bed models with solid block models. Might break modded beds
chloride.general.screen.desc:
WINDOWED - Game is shown in a window.
BORDERLESS - Game is shown in "Windowed" mode without borders and expanded to max screen size without readjust resolution. 
FULLSCREEN - the game will display in native fullscreen mode, readjusting screen resolution to game settings
chloride.interface.fps.title: Show FPS
chloride.interface.fps.desc: Shows the FPS overlay. Advanced mode shows minimum FPS, as well as 30 second average FPS, useful for judging performance.
chloride.interface.fps.system.title: Show System Stats
chloride.interface.fps.system.desc: Shows RAM and GPU usage next to the FPS counter
chloride.interface.fps.align_x.title: Fps Horizontal Alignment
chloride.interface.fps.align_x.desc: Horizontal position of the FPS display
chloride.interface.fps.align_y.title: Fps Vertical Alignment
chloride.interface.fps.align_y.desc: Vertical position of the FPS display
chloride.interface.fps.margin_x.title: Fps Horizontal Margin
chloride.interface.fps.margin_x.desc: Horizontal offset of the FPS display
chloride.interface.fps.margin_y.title: Fps Vertical Margin
chloride.interface.fps.margin_y.desc: Vertical offset of the FPS display
chloride.interface.fps.shadow.title: Fps Shadow Box
chloride.interface.fps.shadow.desc: Add a Shadow box into the FPS text, at the pure style of F3 text
Language updates only reload language instead of all resources, a 99.9% extra of speed
chloride.interface.borderless.f11.title: Borderless on F11
chloride.interface.borderless.f11.desc:
ATTACH - Adds borderless in the cycle
REPLACE - Replaces Fullscreen with Borderless Fullscreen
OFF - Doesn't add borderless to the cycle
chloride.interface.font.shadow.title: Font Shadows
chloride.interface.font.shadow.desc:
If disabled, text will stop rendering shadows giving a flat style.
Increases FPS depending of how much text is on the screen, specially with BetterF3 mods
chloride.interface.jei.title: Hide JEI/REI/EMI until Searching
chloride.interface.jei.desc: Hides JEI/REI/EMI item list unless you search something. Type space to show it without searching
chloride.world.blueband.title: Sky Blue band
chloride.world.blueband.desc: If disabled, removed the Blue Band effect in all dimensions
chloride.world.fog.title: Sky Fog
chloride.world.fog.desc: If disabled, removed fog effect only in the overworld
chloride.world.custom_fog.title: Custom Fog
chloride.world.custom_fog.start.title: Custom Fog Start
chloride.world.custom_fog.start.desc: Configure the start of the fog
chloride.world.custom_fog.end.title: Custom Fog End
chloride.world.custom_fog.end.desc: Configure the end of the fog
chloride.world.custom_fog.shape.title: Custom Fog Shape
chloride.world.custom_fog.shape.desc: Configure the shape of the fog
chloride.world.clouds.height.title: Cloud Height
chloride.world.clouds.height.desc.__COMM: RAISES CLOUD HEIGHT must be replaced with a local joke, of a meme, or something funny in your language
chloride.world.clouds.height.desc:
Raises cloud height.
Configure the height of the clouds, has no effect for happy ghasts
chloride.world.leaves_culling.title: Leaves Culling
chloride.world.leaves_culling.desc: Reduces the number of leaves visible faces of the same type, Controls the depth of the culling
chloride.world.fade.title: Chunk Fade in
chloride.world.fade.desc: If enabled, chunks will fade in when loading.
chloride.darkness.level.title: Darkness Level
chloride.darkness.level.desc: Makes darkness more darker, making darkness attenuation more intense.
chloride.darkness.others.title: Enable in Other dimensions
chloride.darkness.others.desc:
True darkness will be applied in other dimensions

[WARNING] This option will be removed in a near future in favor of a blacklist
chloride.darkness.overworld.title: Enable on Overworld
chloride.darkness.overworld.desc: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the Overworld.
chloride.darkness.noskylight.title: Enable on SkyLess dimensions
chloride.darkness.noskylight.desc: If enabled, true darkness will be applied on dimensions without skylight
chloride.darkness.nether.title: Enable on Nether
chloride.darkness.nether.desc: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the Nether.
chloride.darkness.nether.brightness.desc: Configure fog brightness in the Nether when darkness is enabled.
chloride.darkness.end.title: Enable on End
chloride.darkness.end.desc: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the End.
chloride.darkness.end.brightness.title: End Fog Brightness
chloride.darkness.end.brightness.desc: Configure fog brightness in the End when darkness is enabled.
chloride.darkness.blocklightonly.title: Block light only
chloride.darkness.blocklightonly.desc: If enabled, Disables sky, fog and moon brightness, making blocks as a only source of light
chloride.darkness.moonphase.title: Use Moon Phases
chloride.darkness.moonphase.desc: If enabled, Darkness will be affected by Moon Phases
chloride.darkness.moonphase.fresh.title: New Moon Bright (min)
chloride.darkness.moonphase.fresh.desc: Configure brightness on a new moon, or minimal bright level on black moon phase
chloride.darkness.moonphase.full.title: Full Moon Bright (max)
chloride.darkness.moonphase.full.desc: Configure brightness on a full moon, or maximum bright level on black moon phase
chloride.particles.rain.title: Rain Particles
chloride.particles.rain.desc: Enables the water falling particles when raining
chloride.particles.rain.drop.title: Rain Drop Particles
chloride.particles.rain.drop.desc: Enables the water drop in floor particles of the rain
chloride.particles.block.cracking.title: Block Cracking Particles
chloride.particles.block.cracking.desc: Enables the block cracking particles when breaking blocks
chloride.particles.block.destroy.title: Block Breaking Particles
chloride.particles.block.destroy.desc: Enables the block breaking particles when breaking blocks
chloride.particles.provider: Particle provided by: ยง6ยงl%s
chloride.entities.nametag.players.title: Nametag on Players
chloride.entities.nametag.players.desc: Disable it prevents nametag rendering for all Players
chloride.entities.nametag.entities.title: Nametag on Entities
chloride.entities.nametag.entities.desc: Disable it prevents nametag rendering for all Entities
chloride.entities.nametag.items.title: Nametag on Item Frames
chloride.entities.nametag.items.desc: Disable it prevents nametag rendering for Items, including items inside item frames
chloride.entities.culling.vseureka.warni: VSEureka detected, vertical distance (raw) is ignored and uses instead horizontal distance (squared)
chloride.entities.culling.title: Max Entity Distance
chloride.entities.culling.desc: If enabled, Entities will be hidden based on configured distance limit
chloride.entities.culling.distance.horiz: Hides and does not tick entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
chloride.entities.culling.distance.verti: Hides and does not tick entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
chloride.entities.culling.monster.title: Max Monster Distance
chloride.entities.culling.monster.desc: If enabled, Monsters (hostile entities) will be hidden based on configured distance limit
chloride.entities.culling.monster.distan: Hides and does not tick monsters beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around XP farms.
Hides and does not tick monsters underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
chloride.entities.culling.tiles.title: Max Block Entity Distance
chloride.entities.culling.tiles.desc: If enabled, Block Entities will be hidden based on configured distance limit
Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.

Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
chloride.zoom.title: Enable Zoom
chloride.zoom.desc: Turns on Zoom feature, can be activated by pressing
chloride.zoom.forbidden: JustZoom or Zume detected, chloride zoom its now disabled
chloride.zoom.max.title: Max Zoom
chloride.zoom.max.desc: Sets maximum zoom possible using mouse wheel
